name: Zombie Hour
description:
Are you there, Mr. Chon? It's me, the overworked coffee shop employee trying to get to work in an apocalypse. 

How to play!
--> Use your arrow keys to move around. 
--> Interact with objects by running into them. 
--> Click any arrow button to continue dialogue. 

TIPS! 
--> Interact with everything! If it's red, then you can interact with it.
--> Sometimes, you may miss things because you didn't see them or simply didn't interact with them. Please watch the play-through I attached just in case you missed something. 

This game was made using bitsy.
